sentences.en: " Why not announce thyself openly, and cast me off at once? "
sentences.cn: “ 你为什么不公开站出来, 把我立刻抛弃 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: After announcing himself at the reception desk, James was led upstairs.
sentences.cn: 在接待处通报姓名后，詹姆斯被领上楼去。

sentences.en: All visitors to the apartment building must be announced.
sentences.cn: 那幢公寓楼的访客都必须通报。

sentences.en: At the end of their meeting, it was announced that an agreement had been reached.
sentences.cn: 会议最后宣布已达成一项协议。

sentences.en: I promised I'd announce the wage - cut tomorrow for sure.
It has been announce d that Mr. A and Miss B will be married next week.
sentences.cn: 已正式宣布A先生与B小姐将于下星期结婚.

sentences.en: Now is the time for the Chancellor to take the bull by the horns and announce a two per cent cut in interest rates.
sentences.cn: 现在是财政大臣迎难而上，宣布利率下调两个百分点的时候了。

sentences.en: She was bursting to announce the news but was sworn to secrecy.
sentences.cn: 她急不可待想宣布这个消息，但却发过誓要守口如瓶。

sentences.en: Some of Australia's largest listed companies are expected to announce huge interim earnings this week.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚最大的一些上市公司预计将在本周宣布巨额中期盈利。

sentences.en: The butler gave a little cough to announce his presence.
sentences.cn: 男管家轻轻咳了一下,示意他已到场.

sentences.en: The children listened for the bell to announce the New Year.
sentences.cn: 孩子们等着听新年的钟声.

sentences.en: The jury is [ are ] about to announce the winners.
sentences.cn: 评委会 即将宣布优胜者.

sentences.en: The paper published an extra to announce the end of the war.
sentences.cn: 那家报纸出版号外宣布战争结束的消息.

sentences.en: The peculiar thing about getting engaged is that you're meant to announce it to everyone.
sentences.cn: 订婚的特别之处在于，你就应该让人人知道你订婚了。

sentences.en: The RSC was calling a press conference to announce the theatre's closure.
sentences.cn: 皇家莎士比亚剧团要召开新闻发布会，宣布剧院关闭。

sentences.en: They announced their engagement in ‘The Times’.
sentences.cn: 他们在《泰晤士报》上宣布了订婚的消息。

sentences.en: This is to announce the ball on the weekend.
sentences.cn: 兹订于本周末举行舞会.

sentences.en: to announce sth over the intercom
sentences.cn: 通过内部通话系统宣布

sentences.en: Would you announce the guests as they come in?
sentences.cn: 客人来时你通报一声好 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 宣布，宣称，通知，宣布某人到达，播音
trans.tran_en: to officially tell people about something, especially about a plan or a decision

trans.tran_cn: 宣布， 发表； 声称， 述说； 预告， 预示
trans.tran_en: to officially tell people about something, especially about a plan or a decision
